title: France panorama. [No. 69/29]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Sky on earth - why so many villages in the south-western region of France bear the name of “star”. 2. Athletics - France vs Poland. 3. The passing scene: The bi-centenary of Cuvier. Homage to Degas. 4. The French Acadmey.
